metadata.title: RA Family: RTC calendar does not work properly when month changes

sections.content:
Question:
RTC calendar does not work properly when month changes
Answer:
Make sure tm_mon in rtc_time_t is set between 0 (January) and 11 (December). rtc_time_t is defined using the tm structure of the C standard library <time.h> as shown in the comments below.
/** Date and time structure defined in C standard library  */
typedef struct tm rtc_time_t;
As for struct tm, see the description of “Time Functions (time.h)” in the document  “The Red Hat newlib C Library “ that comes with GCC.
Suitable Products
RA and FSP
